nodes.text: Tassahondee Station was a space station where Yrica Quell, a TIE fighter pilot in the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, once maneuvered through the clutterbomb-riddled passages of in her starfighter. Around 5 ABY, Quell, who had since defected to the New Republic, had memories of her service in the 204th, including her time at Tassahondee Station, which she considered more distressing than other memories.
Tassahondee Station was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
